message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, considering its worth to you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I see the value, I'm only able to offer $13,000 at this time. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $13,500?
